sources.title: Red Blood of Courage, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Red Blood of Courage (1935) KERMIT MAYNARD
sources.description:
Stars: Kermit Maynard, Ann Sheridan, Reginald Barlow
 Director: John English

 A man posing as Mark Henry is after Henry's oil land but Henry's niece is part owner and he needs to marry her off to his henchman Slager. Mountie Jim Sullivan arives posing as a wanted man and is soon caught up in the plot when Slager, wanting everything for himself, kills his boss and makes Jim a prisoner.

metadata.Plot: A man posing as Mark Henry is after Henry's oil land but Henry's niece is part owner and he needs to marry her off to his henchman Slager.
